output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present, but this isn't decisive by itself.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions George Simion, who is position nr. 2 on the presidential candidates list.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram, with an estimated reach of 35,000-40,000 impressions.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, very clearly. The post explicitly states "El va fi președintele care va reconstrui România!" and uses the hashtag "#GeorgeSimionPresedinte", directly promoting him for the presidential role.
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's promotional material highlighting achievements and making campaign promises.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured, paid advertisement with clear campaign messaging.
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate (George Simion) - Uses campaign slogans and hashtags - Makes promises about presidential performance - Is being run as paid advertising after the campaign period has ended

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Makes explicit references to the presidential role - Uses campaign hashtags (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte) - Is a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - Makes campaign promises about future presidential actions
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO S.R.L, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidentiale, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea cu ID-ul 528827646645998 promoveaza explicit candidatul George Simion pentru functia de presedinte, folosind expresii precum "El va fi președintele care va reconstrui România" si hashtag-ul "#GeorgeSimionPresedinte", avand un evident caracter de propaganda electorala. Postarea este promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu o audienta estimata intre 35.000 si 40.000 de afisari, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta comportamentul electoral al votantilor in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
